name: Ball bearings
content: As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level, square area that is 10 feet on a side. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesnâ€™t need to make the save.

data.Target: Each creature in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range
